resources.string:
Hi, my name is Chi. 

I am currently a student at College of Southern Nevada. 

I am an avid traveler, yoga enthusiastic, and aspiring programming wizard. 

Here's a little bit more about me in the words of the amazing Janelle Monae: 

"Sometimes a mystery, sometimes I'm free 

Depending on my mood or my attitude 

Sometimes I wanna roll or stay at home 

Walking contradiction, guess I'm factual and fiction..." 

And here's my life mantra by the three beautiful women of Destiny's Child: 

"I'm a survivor, I'm not gonna give up 

I'm not gonna stop, I'm gonna work harder 

I'm a survivor, I'm gonna make it 

I will survive, keep on surviving..."
